items.content_html: A modern JavaScript lightweight utility library.
items.title: AndrewCeM/ac-utils: A modern JavaScript lightweight utility library.

items.content_html: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.
items.title: antharuu/klaim: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for handling translations via the Locize API
items.title: Maxoplata/simple-locize: A lightweight library for handling translations via the Locize API

items.content_html: A low-level, lightweight protocol buffers implementation in JavaScript.
items.title: mapbox/pbf: A low-level, lightweight protocol buffers implementation in JavaScript.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
items.title: testcontainers/testcontainers-node: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript UI building library that prioritizes transparency and direct access to native browser features.
items.title: DeepDoge/purified.js: A lightweight JavaScript UI building library that prioritizes transparency and direct access to native browser features.

items.content_html: Language Switcher (vls) is a lightweight gutenberg block module designed to facilitate language and region selection on your website. It provides a user-friendly modal window for users to choose their preferred language and region, seamlessly redirecting them to the selected content.
items.title: VSG-EMEA/vsge-language-switcher: Language Switcher (vls) is a lightweight gutenberg block module designed to facilitate language and region selection on your website. It provides a user-friendly modal window for users to choose their preferred language and region, seamlessly redirecting them to the selected content.

items.title: Krutsch/hydro-js: A lightweight (5K compressed) reactive UI library via template literal tags.
